API Provider Information
------------------------

**Microsoft Planetary Computer**

* Terms: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/legal/microsoft-apis/terms-of-use
* Data licensing varies by dataset
* Authentication required

**Element84 EarthSearch**

* Open API access (no authentication required)
* Data licensing varies by dataset
* AWS Open Data Terms apply

User Responsibilities
---------------------

By using this software, you agree to:

1. Review and comply with all third-party API terms
2. Check individual dataset licensing requirements
3. Provide proper data attribution as required
4. Use third-party services at your own risk
5. Not hold the authors liable for third-party issues

For complete details, see the `LICENSE <https://github.com/yourusername/open-geodata-api/blob/main/LICENSE>`_ file.
